root.name: Jim Henson's Muppets Party Cruise
root.description: Cruise with Kermit, Miss Piggy, Animal, plus all your other favorite Muppets. Play 30 of the fast and fun action-packed minigames as you earn your way to the first class deck.Funny, fast-paced and zany fun for one to four players of all ages.Play as Kermit, Miss Piggy, Animal, Fozzie, Gonzo, or Pepe, plus enjoy appearances from all your other favorite Muppet characters.30 exciting minigames to compete in such as Rhythm Mayhem, Shuffle Chalk, and Bunsen's Burners.Play the full interactive board game or just jump aboard into the minigames.
